entries.modify_delay_prompt: Select the amount of time (in tenths of a second) you would like to have as a delay between this event and the prior event.
entries.modify_index_prompt: Select the event index for which you would like to modify the delay time.
entries.cannot_reorder: The event reorder operation you have selected is not possible.
entries.reorder_prompt: Select the entry whose position you would like to modify and click the
button to update its position. Click
when you are satisfied with the show event order.
entries.remove_prompt: Select the show event to remove then click
entries.data_prompt: The current status of your firework show is listed below.
